SEARCH
Package cycling

Class Team

java.lang.Object
cycling.Team
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Team extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a cycling team, including its unique identifier, name, description, and the riders.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Olly Johnson and Laith Al Qudah
See Also:
